content.raw:
Have you seen compile errors like this:

```
/home/nkoenig/local/include/optixu/optixu_math_namespace.h: In function ‘float fminf(float, float)’:
/home/nkoenig/local/include/optixu/optixu_math_namespace.h:172:55: error: declaration of ‘float fminf(float, float)’ has a different exception specifier
 OPTIXU_INLINE float fminf(const float a, const float b)
```
